Lewis Stein

untitled, 1968-72, 85”x41”x3 1/2” (216x104x9 cm), solid core wood door, chrome door hardware, enamel and wood

This piece consists of a solid core door in a doorjamb secured to a wall. A regular door chain is secured between the door and the jamb from the inside. Under optimal conditions, ten or more identical door would be placed at regular intervals in an exhibit space

 
 
  • Installation view Griffen McGear Gallery, New York 1989
